title: Awesome List Updates on May 07, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 07, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Tmux
items.content_text:
### Tools and session management

*   [tmux-suspend (‚≠ê142)](https://github.com/MunifTanjim/tmux-suspend) Suspend local session for painlessly working with nested remote session.

### Status Bar

*   [tmux-mode-indicator (‚≠ê171)](https://github.com/MunifTanjim/tmux-mode-indicator) Displays prompt indicating currently active Tmux mode.
items.content_html:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-suspend (‚≠ê142) Suspend local session for painlessly working with nested remote session.

Status Bar

  • tmux-mode-indicator (‚≠ê171) Displays prompt indicating currently active Tmux mode.

items.title: Awesome Standard
items.content_text:
### editor plugins

*   Visual Studio Code: **[vscode-standard](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=standard.vscode-standard)** - linter & auto-fixer
items.content_html:
editor plugins

  • Visual Studio Code: vscode-standard - linter & auto-fixer

items.title: Discount for Student Dev
items.content_text:
### Data science

*   [Deepnote](https://deepnote.com/education) \[FREE] - The best way to collaborate with others on data science projects. Education plan allows you to create an unlimited amount of Deepnote teams and work with any number of collaborators.
items.content_html:
Data science

  • Deepnote [FREE] - The best way to collaborate with others on data science projects. Education plan allows you to create an unlimited amount of Deepnote teams and work with any number of collaborators.

items.title: Awesome Playcanvas
items.content_text:
### Interactive Experiences

*   [DOOH Invaders](https://vimeo.com/136313614) - World's largest Space Invaders clone unveiled at Cannes Lions.
*   [Fatal System Error](https://playcanv.as/p/A5qC9ftM/?overlay=false) - Interactive opera experience created by Dumbworld from the Royal Opera House.
items.content_html:
Interactive Experiences

  • DOOH Invaders - World's largest Space Invaders clone unveiled at Cannes Lions.
  • Fatal System Error - Interactive opera experience created by Dumbworld from the Royal Opera House.

items.title: Awesome Pascal
items.content_text:
### Editors

*   [QDSEquations (‚≠ê42)](https://github.com/karser/QDSEquations). `[Delphi]` Equation editor for Delphi and Lazarus that allows you to enter and display math formulas of any complexity, from simple Greek symbols to matrixes and complex integral expressions.
items.content_html:
Editors

  • QDSEquations (‚≠ê42). [Delphi] Equation editor for Delphi and Lazarus that allows you to enter and display math formulas of any complexity, from simple Greek symbols to matrixes and complex integral expressions.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Development

- API: [ApicAgent](https://www.apicagent.com)

  Description: Extract device details from user-agent string

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Games & Comics

- API: [FreeToGame](https://www.freetogame.com/api-doc)

  Description: Free-To-Play Games Database

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes


- API: [GamerPower](https://www.gamerpower.com/api-read)

  Description: Game Giveaways Tracker

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### URL Shorteners

- API: [1pt (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/1pt-co/api/blob/main/README.md)

  Description: A simple URL shortener

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Ios
items.content_text:
### Animation

*   [SPPerspective (‚≠ê345)](https://github.com/ivanvorobei/SPPerspective) - Widgets iOS 14 animation with 3D and dynamic shadow. Customisable transform and duration.

items.title: Webcomponents the Right Way
items.content_text:
### Case Studies

*   [How we use Web Components at GitHub](https://github.blog/2021-05-04-how-we-use-web-components-at-github/)
*   [Using web components to encapsulate CSS and resolve design system conflicts](https://about.gitlab.com/blog/2021/05/03/using-web-components-to-encapsulate-css-and-resolve-design-system-conflicts/)

### Component Libraries

*   [github-elements (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/github/github-elements) - GitHub's Web Component collection.
*   [Vaadin components (‚≠ê521)](https://github.com/vaadin/web-components) - Evolving set of high-quality web components for building business web applications.
items.content_html:
Case Studies

  • How we use Web Components at GitHub
  • Using web components to encapsulate CSS and resolve design system conflicts

Component Libraries

  • github-elements (‚≠ê2.9k) - GitHub's Web Component collection.
  • Vaadin components (‚≠ê521) - Evolving set of high-quality web components for building business web applications.

Image Generation

items.title: Awesome Streaming
items.content_text:
### Table of Contents / Data Pipeline

*   [StreamSets Data Collector (‚≠ê96)](https://github.com/streamsets/datacollector-oss) \[Java] - continuous big data ingestion infrastructure that reads from and writes to a large number of end-points, including S3, JDBC, Hadoop, Kafka, Cassandra and many others.

### Table of Contents / Streaming SQL

*   [Siddhi (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/siddhi-io/siddhi) \[Java] - A cloud native Streaming and Complex Event Processing engine that understands Streaming SQL queries in order to capture events from diverse data sources, process them, detect complex conditions, and publish output to various endpoints in real time.
items.content_html:
Table of Contents / Data Pipeline

  • StreamSets Data Collector (‚≠ê96) [Java] - continuous big data ingestion infrastructure that reads from and writes to a large number of end-points, including S3, JDBC, Hadoop, Kafka, Cassandra and many others.

Table of Contents / Streaming SQL

  • Siddhi (‚≠ê1.6k) [Java] - A cloud native Streaming and Complex Event Processing engine that understands Streaming SQL queries in order to capture events from diverse data sources, process them, detect complex conditions, and publish output to various endpoints in real time.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Version Manager / Diagnostics

items.content_html:
Version Manager / Diagnostics

  • NTBBloodbath/nvenv (‚≠ê57) - A lightweight and blazing fast Neovim version manager.
